item.title: ChatGPT Writing Styles
item.description: Introduction While “AI” has been on startup pitch decks for several years now, the last 6 months have seen a marked acceleration. Ever since both OpenAI announced ChatGPT and stability.ai announced Stable Diffusion in November 2022, there has been a proliferation in interesting use cases with these technologies. Some people are starting new companies, firmly hitching their horses to the AI wagon, and others are writing panicked opinion pieces petitioning Congress to regulate AI.
